summary: Comprehensive testing of INSpace Insurance Risk Analytics platform completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI and most integrations working correctly with one minor asset interaction issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Asset markers not clickable due to overlay interception
ui_bugs.details: Main grid div intercepts pointer events preventing asset marker clicks. Need to adjust CSS z-index or pointer-events property.

passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (13/13 tests passed)
Portfolio View and Event Simulation tab switching
KPI bar displays correct portfolio metrics
KPI bar switches to flood metrics when flood layer active
Left panel controls with base maps, filters, and layers
Flood layer toggle and opacity controls
Map view with asset markers and flood zones rendering
Right panel with Selection and Property Details tabs
Flood zones display with correct colors (pink, blue, yellow)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix asset marker click interaction by adjusting CSS z-index or pointer-events on map container to allow asset marker clicks. This is preventing users from selecting individual assets on the map.
